OOC: My main mistake was assuming there were thousands
of NPCs all over the planet, so I just put 2 bots in
Africa, 1 in Maximal City, and made up a history for
them, rather than bothering to post an intro.  The
other problem was C. Wolf seemed to not have a problem
with this.  I might have listened to other peoples
criticizim and gotten it corrected quickly, except he
just accepted my chars without question, and defended
me no matter how crazy my posts got.  In the end I was
banned for 2 months, and then I finally learned how to
do posts that could be accepted (although until the
restart I still really sucked).

--- aerosmith60@... wrote:
> OOC:honestly i really dislike how ur treating dewy
> at this point man. I dont 
> know what his past mistakes were but let it go.
>
